definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: pity, look upon with compassion (Aram. h.os, [[חוּס]] pity, spare; As. ḫû s, in n.pr. cf. Dl:Pr 181)—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of the eye, [[עין]], [[ס על]]([[ו]])[[תח]] ([[לא]]) the eye shall (not) look with compassion, pity, upon De 7:16, De 13:9, De 19:13, Is 13:18, Ez Eze 7:4, Eze 20:17; [[לא חסה עָלַיִח עין]] Ez Eze 16:5; [[עֵינְכֶם אַל־תָּחׂס]] [[עַל־כְּלֵיכֶם]]Ge 45:20 (R:JE) let not your eye look with regret upon your stuff; with ellipsis of [[עַיִן]] 1Sa 24:11 (but rd. [[וׇאָחֻס]], for [[וַתָּחָס]] LXX SyrVer Targum We Klo Dr); with ellipsis of [[על]] De 19:21, De 25:12, Ez Eze 5:11, Eze 7:9, Eze 8:18, Eze 9:10; [[ע֠ל תחס עיני֠כם]] ([[אל]]) Ez Eze 9:5

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of God [[חוסה על]] Ne 13:22, Joe 2:17; [[לא אחוס על נינוה]] Jon 4:11; ellipsis of [[עַל]] Je 13:14, Ez Eze 24:14.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of man: the Messianic king [[על־דַּל וְאֶבְיוֹן]] Ps 72:13 he shall have pity on poor and needy, Nebuchadrezzar [[עליהם]] (i.e. on Zedekiah and the people) Je 21:7; Jonah, [[על הקיקיון]] Jon 4:10.—Vid. also [[חמל]].
